item.title: AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog - The Guardian
item.description:
1. AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog  The Guardian
  2. The Age of AI Child Abuse Is Here  The Atlantic
  3. Ventura teen finds her voice lobbying for bill on AI child abuse  VC Star
  4. US prosecutors see rising threat of AI-generated child sex abuse imagery  KSL.com
